SELECT PM.PM_KEY , PM.PM_CLASS_CD , PM.PM_DETAIL_CLASS_CD , PM.PM_LINE_CD, PM_NM_CD , PM.MF_AC_KEY , PM.PM_RELEASE_DT , PM.EOL_DT , PM.EOSL_DT , PM.PM_REMARK , PM.REG_DT , PM.REG_TM , PM.REG_EMP_KEY , PM.MOD_DT , PM.MOD_TM , PM.MOD_EMP_KEY , AC.AC_NM FROM PM_PRODUCT_MNG_TB PM JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB AC ON PM.MF_AC_KEY = AC.AC_KEY WHERE 1=1
AND PM.PM_CLASS_CD = #{productDivision}
AND (PM.EOL_DT IS NULL OR PM.EOL_DT = "") AND (PM.EOSL_DT IS NULL OR PM.EOSL_DT = "")
AND PM.EOL_DT IS NOT NULL AND PM.EOL_DT != ""
AND PM.EOSL_DT IS NOT NULL AND PM.EOSL_DT != ""
AND AC.AC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{productMake}, '%'))
AND PM.PM_NM_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{productName}, '%'))
AND PM.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PM.REG_DT, PM.MF_AC_KEY DESC

SELECT PM.PM_KEY , PM.PM_CLASS_CD , PM.PM_DETAIL_CLASS_CD , PM.PM_LINE_CD , PM_NM_CD , PM.MF_AC_KEY , PM.PM_RELEASE_DT , PM.EOL_DT , PM.EOSL_DT , PM.PM_REMARK , PM.REG_DT , PM.REG_TM , PM.REG_EMP_KEY , PM.MOD_DT , PM.MOD_TM , PM.MOD_EMP_KEY , AC.AC_NM FROM PM_PRODUCT_MNG_TB PM JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB AC ON PM.MF_AC_KEY = AC.AC_KEY WHERE PM.PM_KEY = #{pmKey} AND PM.DELETE_YN = 'N'

AND PM.EOSL_DT IS NOT NULL AND PM.EOSL_DT != ""
